channel.title: Bunch of problems read now!
channel.description:
Well lately my server well my coding going in the crapper but my servers getting more populated but i havent really coded anything i have just added more npcs and stuff these are the things i dont know how to do can someone help.......
1.How do i make a ::help or edit the server news like when u login how do i make it say or forums and stuff?
2.i cant seem to make a portal teleport anywhere every time i search it in client.java and i search for the stuff it says not found?
3.how can i lock my client so noone can edit anything or edit the ip or such?
PLEASE REPLY I NEED HELP!!! :confused:

item.title: Bunch of problems read now!
item.dc:creator: @West7man West7man
item.description:
@West7man wrote:

Oh you need to update your common sense.

  1. Open your project folder >> Search for “chat” or “::” or something like that… You’ll probably find the file.
    I think there should be a file “commandhandler.java” or “commandmanager.java”
  2. Compile it(class files are compiled java files) But it’s still editable for some haxors who can use very smart programs

Read full topic
